samples.comment:
I sent a message that I was unable to play videos on the app.  I explained that I cleared the app cache, uninstalled and reinstalled the app, made sure that I had the latest version of Spark and YouTube.

I got a response from Devon (AI) that said "try clearing your cache", and some VPN suggestions.  I don't have a VPN.  Totally worthless.  Then it says if I need further help I could request human assistance. How do I do that?  I guess I will try sending another message.

Your AI agent disregards some parts of the original message, where I explain which steps I have already taken to troubleshoot the problem. After it is giving advices do follow these very steps. Complete waist of my time.

Your AI gives generic solution not taking into account the facts I provided with the support request. Poor, as well as your software development and testing, obviously. While your physical products are good, i will no longer buy anything from you because of lousy software.
I think you shpukd have emailed an update that spotify was not working, instead of leaving me withoit knowing wjat was wrong with my amp
I need human support, not IA

I think this  is not a real person. In fact AI or a computer. I looked into this  and found its a REAL PROBLEM between owners of the Positive Grid amp!! I want to know whats being down to fix this. People are coming in to Guitar Center demanding to have this fixed or money back!

Your youtube playback still not working!!

Biggest reason I purchase Spark 40.

ERROR 15!!!    "Video Unavailable"

Please address

At this point I think I'll sell the spark 40 and get the mooer. Your customer service is non existant. What a shame, I've had this thing for several years but when I needed help there was non. AI customer service? What a rip off!!! I'll never buy a spark again!!!

Error 15 issue on backing tracks not fixed. No comms with an actual person ...just ai bot . Problem perhaps created by an app update that put in ai features I don't want that created a real basic user problem !

j'ai contacté le service support
l'IA ma répondu en me demandant de faire plusieurs actions: sans succès
le problème semble général sur ce code 15 car plusieurs alertes sont remontées sur la communauté des spark mini
je ne comprend pas cette lenteur d'action ni pourquoi nous avons des réponses via l'AI (qui propose toujours les mêmes actions) et non par un humain, on aurai gagné du temps

le problème persiste malgré mes relances du service support
de plus il semble que je ne soit pas le semble dans ce cas, il suffit de lire les derniers commentaires des utilisateur spark
Pourquoi le support met tout ce temps pour réagir à un problème important?
An AI response that told me to do what I already told it I did? Not helpful…
I don’t appreciate that your feedback comes from an AI. I don’t appreciate that at all.

Although the AI response to my inquiry did provide some information, the instructions for creating and editing models were incorrect or not full articulated. I ended up having to track down some information in a YouTube video.

Get rid of AI and get a real person to help me!
G Dudley

I ordered this item and then immediately tried to cancel the order .
I sent an email to support for assistance but received an AI generated response saying it would alert shipping to stop the process.
That didn't happen so now the item is in transit and expected to be delivered Thursday October 30th.
I may not be at home to refuse the delivery and was told I would be charged to ship it back.
That just shouldn't be, and 'm not at all happy about that. I should receive an RMA with a prepaid return shipping label. 
I planned on purchasing the Spark Live 2 and your guitar wireless system after I sold off a few items in order not to create another bill .
I purchased this accidentally, thus prompting the quick email to support for cancellation.
If you want to credit me 10% off my purchase price, I'll keep it, and then, later on,  order your wireless guitar system.
Otherwise,I'll just return it .

Best Regards 
Armand Cadieux
An AI response sent me through multiple troubleshooting hoops with you actually knew there was a problem and you didn't come out and say it.
didnt even get a human response, instead recieved an AI generated response that seemingly didnt even read my ticket at all, as it suggested things i had already tried.
Not after any company secrets. Just a picture of the main board.

Een robot die mijn telkens dezelfde antwoorden geeft die niet een oplossing bieden op vragen  die ik gesteld heb is zeer frustrerend.
Uiteindelijk is een deel van de problemen door een "mens" opgelost maar een belangrijk probleem nog niet

allComments.comment: I am not sure if the problem is with the bias software, the digital interface or the bias interface with the computer.   Right now it appears to be working
The solution provided did not solve the problem.

I sent a message that I was unable to play videos on the app.  I explained that I cleared the app cache, uninstalled and reinstalled the app, made sure that I had the latest version of Spark and YouTube.

I got a response from Devon (AI) that said "try clearing your cache", and some VPN suggestions.  I don't have a VPN.  Totally worthless.  Then it says if I need further help I could request human assistance. How do I do that?  I guess I will try sending another message.

Your AI agent disregards some parts of the original message, where I explain which steps I have already taken to troubleshoot the problem. After it is giving advices do follow these very steps. Complete waist of my time.
So much better if you had an 800# with actual customer service. Customer service is non existent with todays companies.

Your AI gives generic solution not taking into account the facts I provided with the support request. Poor, as well as your software development and testing, obviously. While your physical products are good, i will no longer buy anything from you because of lousy software.

Still no resolution to the Error Code 15.
It's immensely frustrating 😤
I think you shpukd have emailed an update that spotify was not working, instead of leaving me withoit knowing wjat was wrong with my amp
No result. App and gear unusable
I need human support, not IA
Issues with android connection to operate you tube videos is not working since update

I unfortunately on a day after the release of your new spark app version  did the upgrade to my ipad mini 4 already running ios 15.8.5     Then after your app upgrade the spark app is knocked out of memory at your banner screen and Im put back to my ios desktop screen.  

telling me its an older ipad mini after not telling me that or noting in your app download page that it wont work with the latest ios for that mini is  a big screw up on your side.  I cant be the only person that got orphaned in this situation    Im not a happy customer - you should be able to let me get access to the previous app so I dont get bricked.
The problem I have ,many people seem to have an they can't fix it,if this is the case then something needs to b done .

I think this  is not a real person. In fact AI or a computer. I looked into this  and found its a REAL PROBLEM between owners of the Positive Grid amp!! I want to know whats being down to fix this. People are coming in to Guitar Center demanding to have this fixed or money back!
The chariot just told me “sorry we bricked your iPad”.
My Go still won't play YouTube, Apple is working, is there a way of playing over MP3 like on a line 6 ?..

Your youtube playback still not working!!

Biggest reason I purchase Spark 40.

ERROR 15!!!    "Video Unavailable"

Please address

You tube backing tracks not working still, so nothing was accomplished
Issue is still open.  Error code 15 not resolved.
Awful. Nothing is working to update my amp.  This is beyond frustrating

didnt even get a human response, instead recieved an AI generated response that seemingly didnt even read my ticket at all, as it suggested things i had already tried.
Not after any company secrets. Just a picture of the main board.

Een robot die mijn telkens dezelfde antwoorden geeft die niet een oplossing bieden op vragen  die ik gesteld heb is zeer frustrerend.
Uiteindelijk is een deel van de problemen door een "mens" opgelost maar een belangrijk probleem nog niet
Use of AI is inexcusable
You should make it possible for users to return to a previous version of the Spark App if the latest version won't work on their iPhone.
the service was great, but still have the problems
It jiust did not answer my question with any degrree of resolution
Terrible. Nothing suggested works. Beyond frustrating. Might as well sell all my spark gear and move on.
Why wasn't windows 7 included in the firmware upgrades. There was nothing wrong with the 7 platform. You assumed everyone had higher gen windows.

I have spent hours on investigating the DAW and stand-alone issue with your product and helped your development team, only to get the result I was proposing already right from the beginning (buffer rates smaller than 1024 prevent crashes). Not to speak about your pathetic advice to check for version updates regularly, or to make a thorough documentation by video, just tonaee, how a program crashes. I have reproduced this issue on multiple other systems (3), showed my system and ASIO set-up. Besides I am sure no one will read this feedback, so I will feel free to share my experience with BIAS X in my producing and band community online and offline.

I am very unhappy with the spark app, which I find intrusive, cluttered, aggressive and very hard to operate. So I asked for a workaround to get access to what I need: A simple setup with a drum machine, so that I can make MY music, not fiddling around with that AI-crap.
The response of the AI-chat was quick and I felt that the question was understood. Unfortunately I was not offered a solution, but that is, because the product is bad (for my use cases: I want to play Jazz).

There was no support. Only canned answers for non-issues. My problem needs real tech support. I love the products I have purchased from Positive Grid but theirTech support sucks. I can not justify buying anything else from a company that can't stand behind their products. A damn shame.

I was hoping to establish contact with a real person, not an AI bot.
I am still having problems getting the app to start on my ipad.
It was working before...
i have deleted and re-installed several time now.
All my other ipad apps work fine.
Now the red and black starting screen shows for a second and then disappears

You shouldn’t suggest app updates until you verify whether it will work with iPad mini 4
After the update spark app won’t open.
I still think as software app there is a lot missing as user

The person providing the support was very professional and trying to make the best of a bad situation. It is certainly not their fault that the app being "upgraded" would make it non-functional for users not using IOS 16 or above. it does make one mindful of the fact that if one purchases your companies products in the future this will probably happen every time. One will be required to purchase a $500 cell phone, or tablet in order to keep updating a $300 amp. It seems like a chase for folly. I was perfectly happy with my amp as it was and as I had paid for it. Now that amp does less than the amp that it replaced and certainly A LOT less than the amp that I initially purchased. I was offered a $20 gift certificate towards new product by the person in customer service. This is extremely ironic in light of the fact that I have a base level product in your companies line up and what I really need now due to the update your company has performed is as new phone. My current one is useless. So am I to buy a newer updated amp with the coupon so that it will also not work with my current IOS? I have made far worse mistake than buying your product and it did provide me with joy when it did what it was designed to do. Now it is an expensive blue tooth speaker with some pre-set applications. Good luck with your new business model. I
AI.
Still waiting on a software update so I can use my app on my iPad running 15.8.5

I can no longer use the app with my spark amps. The app is key to the basic functioning of the amp so my performance has been critically impair. Nice that you have been able to reproduce but this is not a solution just a step in the process.
